2025-06-17.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/standard/php-gen2/runtime) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: PHP 8.4 runtime now available
summary.summary: PHP 8.4 runtime is now generally available. This update provides new features and improvements for your applications.
